snippet.title: Legend of Mana | Opening Movie
snippet.description:
Watch the Legend of Mana opening movie! 

Now Remastered for the first time, featuring a colorful cast of characters, exciting real-time combat, and the option to alternate between the original or new rearranged music. 

Legend of Mana is available 24th June 2021 and is now available to pre-purchase on: 
Nintendo Switch™ https://sqex.link/tkf  
Playstation®4 https://sqex.link/an9
Steam https://sqex.link/3zc
